migrations.description: Installs the '@typescript-eslint/utils' package when having installed '@angular-eslint/eslint-plugin' or '@angular-eslint/eslint-plugin-template' with version >=18.0.0.
migrations.name: add-typescript-eslint-utils

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~19.0.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-19-0-0

migrations.description: Add the '@angular/localize/init' polyfill to the 'polyfills' option of targets using esbuild-based executors.
migrations.name: add-localize-polyfill-to-targets

migrations.description: Update '@angular/ssr' import paths to use the new '/node' entry point when 'CommonEngine' is detected.
migrations.name: update-angular-ssr-imports-to-use-node-entry-point

migrations.description: Disable the Angular ESLint prefer-standalone rule if not set.
migrations.name: disable-angular-eslint-prefer-standalone

migrations.description: Remove Angular ESLint rules that were removed in v19.0.0.
migrations.name: remove-angular-eslint-rules

migrations.description: Remove the deprecated 'tailwindConfig' option from ng-packagr executors. Tailwind CSS configurations located at the project or workspace root will be picked up automatically.
migrations.name: remove-tailwind-config-from-ng-packagr-executors

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~19.1.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-19-1-0

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~19.2.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-19-2-0

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~20.0.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-20-0-0

migrations.description: Migrate imports of `provideServerRendering` from `@angular/platform-server` to `@angular/ssr`.
migrations.name: migrate-provide-server-rendering-import

migrations.description: Replace `provideServerRouting` and `provideServerRoutesConfig` with `provideServerRendering` using `withRoutes`.
migrations.name: replace-provide-server-routing

migrations.description: Update the generator defaults to maintain the previous style guide behavior.
migrations.name: set-generator-defaults-for-previous-style-guide

migrations.description: Update 'moduleResolution' to 'bundler' in TypeScript configurations. You can read more about this here: https://www.typescriptlang.org/tsconfig/#moduleResolution.
migrations.name: update-module-resolution

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~20.1.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-20-1-0

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~20.2.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-20-2-0

migrations.description: Remove any Karma configuration files that only contain the default content. The default configuration is automatically available without a specific project configurationfile.
migrations.name: remove-default-karma-configuration-files

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~20.3.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-20-3-0

migrations.description: Replace deprecated tapResponse signature
migrations.name: 20.0.0-rc_0-tap-response

migrations.description: Replaces usages of the deprecated InjectFlags enum
migrations.name: inject-flags

migrations.description: Replaces usages of the deprecated TestBed.get method with TestBed.inject
migrations.name: test-bed-get

migrations.description: Converts the entire application to block control flow syntax
migrations.name: control-flow-migration

migrations.description: Moves imports of `DOCUMENT` from `@angular/common` to `@angular/core`
migrations.name: document-core

migrations.description: Replaces usages of the deprecated Router.getCurrentNavigation method with the Router.currentNavigation signal
migrations.name: router-current-navigation

migrations.description: Adds `BootstrapContext` to `bootstrapApplication` calls in `main.server.ts` to support server rendering.
migrations.name: add-bootstrap-context-to-server-main

migrations.description: Updates Angular Material to v20
migrations.name: migration-v20

migrations.description: Updates the Angular CDK to v20
migrations.name: migration-v20
